text: Easy, copy/paste a web address (aka URL) that begins with http or https.
Easy way of directing students to information outside of Moodle, e.g. to an article.
Not directly. E.g. link to external activities such as students e-portfolios or blogs.
Maybe. Link to external tools, e.g. calendars, groups, blogs or wikis.
Maybe. You can link to external collaborative tools like Etherpad, wikis or blogs.

6 / 6
Can do all of the levels, depending on where you link to.
